## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATHST, HST, PDS2</u>
- **Gene Name:** homogentisate prenyltransferase, homogentisate prenyltransferase, PHYTOENE DESATURATION 2
- **Description:**   homogentisate prenyltransferase;(source:Araport11)

- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
